about_the_game:
XBall is a PvP team sport game where players control the entire team at once, merging real-time tactics with a gritty, underground sports atmosphere. The game draws inspiration from basketball, football, and hockey, but it stands apart as a unique and abstract experience that defies direct comparison.

XBall allows players to customize their matches by selecting different numbers of players and adjusting the game's time pace. Whether you're strategizing through slow, intricate tactics or diving into rapid, chaotic fun, XBall offers a dynamic and versatile gameplay experience that keeps each match fresh and unpredictable.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04, 20.04, 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A real-time tactics PvP sports game with an underground vibe. Control every player on your team in fast-paced matches that blend basketball, football, and hockey. Customize the action with adjustable time pace and team sizes.
